welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villa Ballester, Argentina! Known for its vibrant culture and charming streets, we invite you to discover the beauty of our city and its warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Villa Ballester has to offer."

terminals.description: A smaller terminal for international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
